comment: Thank you very much for the feedback & congrats on your shot! Im getting my first Moderna one on Monday! I also heard from some people that sometimes the second dose isnt quite as bad if you get the shot in one arm the first time and the second shot in the other arm?

                  :frequency (s2 / sometimes)

                              :time (t2 / time
